actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality

official_title: To require the Secretary of Energy to assign the same priority to providing renewable energy production incentive payments for landfill gas facilities as the priority assigned to providing such payments for other biomass facilities.

summary.text: Amends the Energy Policy Act of 1992 to instruct the Secretary of Energy to assign the same priority to renewable energy production incentive payments for landfill gas facilities as to such payments for closed loop biomass facilities.

titles.title: To require the Secretary of Energy to assign the same priority to providing renewable energy production incentive payments for landfill gas facilities as the priority assigned to providing such payments for other biomass facilities.
